title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah’s Air Unit Bases in Lebanon in Response to Rocket Fire: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In response to the rockets fired at Meron: The IDF hit deep into Lebanon at a military compound used by the Hezbollah terror organization’s air unit, including a runway and several of the organization’s military buildings. Other terror targets of the organization in southern Lebanon were attacked during the day.

Just a while ago, fighter jets attacked deep into Lebanon, in the Zabad area, a military compound used by the Hezbollah terror organization’s air unit, in response to the rocket launches carried out earlier today (Tuesday) towards the airspace of the aerial control unit in the Meron area.
The compound was attacked, including a runway for aircraft, and several other military buildings of the terror organization.

During the day, fighter jets attacked a military building and terror infrastructure in the area of the village Ayta ash-Shab and in the area of the village Kila. A lookout post of the Hezbollah terror organization was attacked in the Maroun al-Ras area.

Attached is footage from the attack in the Zabad area: https://bit.ly/3VBdfe8
Attached is footage from the attack on the observation post in the Maroun al-Ras area: https://bit.ly/3IRtDiU
